sourcesContent:
import { useEffect } from "react"; import { DefaultContext } from "../../context"; import swCharacters from "../../data/characters.json"; import swPlanets from "../../data/planets.json"; import swStarships from "../../data/starships.json"; export const Content = () => { const {selector, handleSelectorChange} = useEffect(DefaultContext); return ( <>
{selector === "Characters" && swCharacters.map((character) => (

name: {character.name}

gender: {character.gender}

birthday: {character.birth_year}

))} {selector === "Planets" && swPlanets.map((planet) => (

Name: {planet.name}

Rotation Period: {planet.rotation_period}

Orbital Period: {planet.orbital_period}

))} {selector === "Starships" && swStarships.map((starship) => (

Name: {starship.name}

Model: {starship.model}

Manufacturer: {starship.manufacturer}

))}
) };
